definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: The accident of aortic cannulation is very dangerous and the mortality of this complication is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 主动脉插管意外极为凶险，死亡率非常高。

sentences.english: Earthworms play a vital role in food production.
sentences.chinese: 在粮食生产方面，蚯蚓扮演极为重要的作用。

sentences.english: All of those cancers are relatively rare.
sentences.chinese: 以上癌症都是极为罕有的。

sentences.english: I am regretting to have to inform you that two cases of them are so bad in quality.
sentences.chinese: 我们遗憾地通知您，其中两箱，质量极为差劣。

sentences.english: An investor-friendly package is paramount to funding.
sentences.chinese: 对投资者有利的方案是极为重要的资金。

sentences.english: The citizens are disgusted with the factory because of the pollution that the factory has caused.
sentences.chinese: 由于这家工厂制造成污染，居民们对它极为讨厌。

sentences.english: Well armed and equipped Norse swordsmen. Able to wear chain and plate armour.
sentences.chinese: 北欧剑士装备极为精良，身穿链甲或板甲。

sentences.english: Lisette 's large red mouth broke into a most alluring smile.
sentences.chinese: 莉莎特的鲜红的大嘴露出了一副极为诱人的微笑。

sentences.english: The result is an extremely grave threat to this culture.
sentences.chinese: 结果就是，这个文明面临极为严重的威胁。

sentences.english: World each main scented rice producing country extremely pays attention to the research and development of the aroma rice.
sentences.chinese: 世界各主要香稻生产国对香稻的研究及开发极为重视。

sentences.english: Most architects agree that this is essential to the success of the project.
sentences.chinese: 大部分架构师都认为这对项目的成功极为重要。

sentences.english: Hence, China will face very disadvantageous exterior surroundings in the future economic development.
sentences.chinese: 这将使我国未来经济发展面临极为不利的外部环境。

sentences.english: Even about Pen himself, Mrs. Greed's reports were desperately favourable.
sentences.chinese: 甚至对潘本人，克理德太太的报告也是极为有利的。

sentences.english: Locke was also extremely active in religious affairs.
sentences.chinese: 洛克也极为活跃的宗教事务。

sentences.english: Second, this is an extremely approachable programming model.
sentences.chinese: 其次，这是极为易于使用的编程模型。

sentences.english: When the patient shuts up, buccinator is very flabby, reason quarrel is flagging.
sentences.chinese: 患者闭嘴时，颊肌极为松弛，故口角下垂。

definition: very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
